last_episode_to_air.overview: Malik “a young engineer who is an expert in combating cyber crime, finds himself seeking a gang that was kidnapped and then assassinated his wife, Nour, in a bank robbery. He is determined to chase them for revenge, which leads him to go through many dangerous confrontations

name: Extremely Dangerous
overview: "Malik"  a young engineer who is an expert in combating cyber crime, finds himself seeking a gang that was kidnapped and then assassinated his wife, Nour, in a bank robbery. He is determined to chase them for revenge, which leads him to go through many dangerous confrontations
